data.actual_result: You can report the user and the NSFW Content option is missing
data.expected_result: The report button should not show up even if the user is in a server with over 50 members where you have the Manage Messages permission (like on the desktop app)
data.short_description: You can report anyone from the Direct Messages list
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Direct Messages list and press hold on any user - Tap on the Report button
